wikipedia_page.main: Adam John Drury (born 9 September 1993) is an English footballer who plays for Grimsby Borough. He plays as a winger but can also play as a right back. Drury has previously played for Manchester City, Burton Albion and St Mirren, Bristol Rovers, Gainsborough Trinity and Grimsby Borough.

On 19 August it was announced that midfielder Adam Drury had signed a season long loan deal with Saints, moving from Manchester City.
On 5 January the club announced that Adam Drury had left the club, cutting short his one-year loan period from Manchester City.
